subtitle: An easy store-cupboard recipe - you could use sardines instead if you prefer.

method.text: Transfer the drained pilchards onto a plate. Pour over a little hot water to rinse off excess oil and drain again.
Melt the butter in a shallow dish for 15-30 seconds on 100% FULL power. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Add the pilchards to the dish and turn them over in the mixture.
Cover and cook for 2 - 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> min on 100% FULL power.
Serve on rounds of hot buttered toast.

title: Devilled pilchards on toast - microwave
